title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a user can successfully register with valid input data including email, username, and password, and that the user receives a confirmation message.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input valid email, username, and password
Submit the registration form
Verify registration success message is shown and user is created in the database

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check login is successful when user provides correct email/username and password, and user session is correctly established.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and correct password
Click login button
User is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login is rejected when user provides incorrect username/email or password with a proper error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input incorrect username/email or password
Click login button
Login fails with an appropriate error message and no session is created

title: Create Plugin as Admin with Image and ZIP Upload
description: Verify admin can create a new plugin, upload images and ZIP files, and that uploads preserve their state during interactions.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to Admin Plugins management page
Fill out plugin creation form with valid data
Upload plugin ZIP file and images
Submit plugin creation
Plugin is created successfully with image and ZIP accessible via URLs
Interact with dialog and verify upload state is maintained
Uploads remain intact and properly displayed after actions

title: Subscription Purchase Flow with Checkout
description: Verify user can buy plugin subscriptions using integrated checkout with monthly, annual, and lifetime option and payment succeeds.

steps.description: Login as registered user
Browse marketplace and select a plugin subscription
Select subscription plan (monthly, annual, or lifetime)
Proceed to checkout
Complete payment via integrated Stripe or other provider
Purchase is successful, subscription is created with correct status active

title: License Generation and Activation Post Subscription Purchase
description: Ensure license key is generated automatically after subscription purchase and license status is set to active.

steps.description: Complete subscription purchase
License is generated and linked to the subscription
License has active status and is usable for downloads

title: Download Control with Active License Validation
description: Verify users can download plugin files only if they have an active license and downloads are restricted otherwise.

steps.description: Log in as user with active license
Attempt to download the plugin file
Download starts successfully
Log in as user without license or with expired/canceled license
Attempt to download plugin
Download is denied with appropriate error message

title: Admin Management of Coupons and Promotions
description: Verify admin can create, update, and delete coupons, and discounts are correctly applied during checkout.

steps.description: Login as admin
Navigate to coupon management section
Create a new coupon with specific discount and validity
Coupon is saved and visible in the list
Login as user
Apply coupon code during checkout
Discount is applied to the price correctly
Admin updates or deletes the coupon
Coupon changes reflect immediately in the system

title: Affiliate Program Multi-Level Tracking and Payout Calculation
description: Verify affiliate referrals, click tracking, commission calculations for multi-level affiliates, and that payouts via PayPal, bank, and crypto methods are processed.

steps.description: Affiliate user generates referral link
Referral link is used by visitor to purchase plugin subscription
Clicks and conversions are tracked correctly in affiliate dashboard
Commission is correctly calculated per multi-level rules
Affiliate requests payout via PayPal, bank transfer or crypto
Payout is successfully processed and reflected in system

title: Real-Time Notifications via WebSocket
description: Verify that users and admins receive real-time notifications about metrics, events and alerts using the WebSocket connection with updated data.

steps.description: Establish WebSocket connection as logged-in user
Trigger events like new purchase, plugin upload or alert creation in system
Relevant real-time notification is received promptly
Notification data content is accurate and complete

title: Security: Rate Limiting and CSRF Protection on Critical Endpoints
description: Ensure rate limiting is enforced on login, register, and purchase endpoints and CSRF tokens are validated correctly preventing unauthorized requests.

steps.description: Send rapid repeated requests to login and purchase endpoints exceeding rate limits
Server rejects excessive requests with appropriate HTTP status code (e.g., 429)
Attempt form submission without proper CSRF token on protected routes
Request is rejected and error is returned

title: Audit Logs Capture Security and Access Events
description: Verify that all login attempts, administrative actions, payments and security related events are logged appropriately in security and audit logs.

steps.description: Perform login, logout, and admin plugin creation actions
Trigger payment processing and subscription purchases
Verify logs capture these events with timestamps and relevant details

title: Validation of All Critical Inputs Using Server-Side Schema
description: Test that all critical endpoints validate inputs using Zod or equivalent schema validation preventing invalid or malformed data submission.

steps.description: Send requests with missing required fields
Server returns validation error with descriptive message
Send requests with invalid field formats such as invalid emails or unsupported file types
Server rejects requests with appropriate errors

title: Access Control Enforcement for Admin Routes
description: Verify that admin-only routes (plugin management, user management, coupon management) are accessible only to authenticated users with admin role.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin endpoints without authentication
Access is denied with 401 Unauthorized or redirect to login
Login as regular user and attempt admin actions
Access is denied with 403 Forbidden
Login as admin and access admin routes
Access is granted successfully

title: Analytics Dashboard and Reports Display Correct Data
description: Verify that analytics, reports and alerts configured by admin display accurate and updated metrics that reflect real system data.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to analytics and reports dashboard
Displayed metrics match data from subscriptions, sales, and affiliates
Configure new alert with threshold
Alert triggers when threshold breached and notification is sent

title: Frontend and Backend Data Consistency and Responsiveness
description: Check that front-end UI displays all data from backend accurately and updates in real-time where appropriate, with responsive layout across devices.

steps.description: Login as user and browse marketplace, subscriptions, and download history
Displayed data matches backend database entries
Resize browser to mobile and tablet screen sizes
UI elements remain usable and well aligned
Perform data changes via admin interface
Changes propagate correctly to user views without stale data

title: Expired and Cancelled Subscription and License Restrictions
description: Validate that subscriptions and associated licenses marked as expired or cancelled do not allow downloads or access beyond allowed timeframes.

steps.description: Login as user with expired or cancelled subscription
Attempt to download plugin
Access is denied and the user is informed of subscription status
Attempt to access subscription-only features
Access is blocked appropriately
